content.text:
# Battle of La Hogaza order of battle

The order of battle for the Battle of La Hogaza, on December 2, 1817, in the Venezuelan War of Independence during the Spanish American wars of independence proceeded as follows:
]]
Commander in chief
* Miguel de la Torre
Oficialidad
* Col Pedro González Villa
Units and commanders
Infantry
*  Battalion "Castilla" (Hostalrich): 450 men
*  Battalion "2º Navarra": 550 men
Cavalry
*  2 squadrons Húsares de Fernando VII (1º and 2º): 250 riders
*  1 squadron Lanceros venezolanos: 100 riders
|}
|col2=
]]
Commander in chief
* Pedro Zaraza
Officers
* Torres (infantry)
Units and commanders
Infantry
*  Battalion of the line  "Valeroso"
*  Battalion of the line  "Tiradores"
*  Battalion of the line  "Margariteño"
Artillery
* 2 cannons
Cavalry
*  8 squadrons of the left  (Infante)
*  2 squadrons of the right (Rondón)
}}
